thread.section_title: The Flights Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Flights Guru | theflightsguru.co.uk
thread.title: Stephen O'dwyer
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by Stephen O'dwyer

author: Stephen O'dwyer
title: Stephen O'dwyer
text:
First time using The Flights Guru and must say very impressed. When booking travel for work it's not all about price, need people who know what they are doing and excellent service. I got both when I called and spoke to a chap called Frank, very switched on and clearly knew his industry.
Amazing service from top to bottom, will always be back for future travel
